column1: You don’t have to love Trump to admit he was right more often than the media was.
Every time I fill up the tank I wonder if Bidenomics is supposed to mean I can’t afford groceries and gas.
If tariffs are so bad why are American factories hiring again?
Abortion isn’t healthcare. It’s ending a heartbeat. No amount of hashtags will change that.
They called Trump a dictator for 8 years straight. Funny how the real censorship comes from Silicon Valley billionaires.
Borders exist for a reason. You lock your doors at night don’t you?
Remember when free speech actually meant free speech?
You don’t have to love Trump to admit he was right more often than the media was.
What’s the point of record stock markets if ordinary families can’t buy a house?
We send billions overseas but somehow can’t fix the potholes in front of our schools.
Funny how the party of tolerance can’t handle hearing another opinion. Why so scared of debate liberals?
There's nothing wrong with wanting to protect children from adult topics. Nothing wrong at all.
Import the third world. Become the third world.
Do you think the masked, crazed left will attempt to buy the banned covid vax on the black market this winter?
The same people who say jail doesn't work wanted to throw Donald Trump in jail.
when the worst people hate you, you must be doing something right
